title: Maximize your touring Experience to Greenland with Flightseeing (Andrew Flower)
text: By Andrew Flower Jul 26, 2015 If you are searching for a natural place to enjoy your vacations, but haven't yet decided the place to visit then we would suggest you to visit Greenland. Greenland is one of the most unusual regions around the world that attracts visitors from all over the world. It is one of the few places on the earth, which is very little affected by human activities. This place offers wonderful opportunities for eco-tourism, recreations and sports activities. Being an island, this place is surrounded by water so flightseeing is a good option to enjoy the spots that may be difficult to visit by car, bus or any other medium. Flightseeing Greenland not only covers the land areas, but you can also enjoy beautiful places covered by water or ice. Check below the famous places that can be enjoyed better with flightseeing.Mittivakkat glacier:Located in southeast Greenland, Mittivakkat glacier is the largest ice field on Ammassalik Island. It will take almost one hour to visit through the helicopter and take you along impressing alpine mountains and fiords. You will be pleased with the magnificent atmosphere and views to the sermilik fiord and the mainland.Llulissat Iceberg:Llulissat Iceberg was declared as world heritage by UNESCO in 2004. It has a massive collection of icebergs that are wonderful to see through airplane or helicopter window. The top view of breaking of icebergs and then emerging into the open sea looks just phenomenal.Greenland Ice Cap: A few decades ago, this place was inaccessible for people. But with flighseeing Greenland facility, it is now easier to reach it with the help of a helicopter or plane. This is best for you if you want to see the real wonder of nature on earth.Narsarsuaq Glacier: From take off to return back, it will almost take one and half hour to enjoy Narsarsuaq glacier. You will be filled with excitement as you arrive and your excitement will keep on increasing as you explore this natural place.Nuuk City: Nuuk is the capital of Greenland and is country's largest cultural and economic center. Being a less denser place with a population around a little more than 16,000, it is from one of the smallest capital cities in the world by population. One hour is enough to enjoy this beautiful city by plane or helicopter.To completely enjoy all the wonderful places of this massive island, flightseeing is the best option. These aircraft fly slowly and carry three to four persons at a time, to present best view for everyone. You will feel rumble of the glacier calving beneath you, and then it really feels like an adventure ride. About the Author The author gives you information about greenland and how you can enjoy its various tours like boat tours, flight tours , hiiking tours and fishing tours. Rating:
